Selected Answer: A
A. Customer survey comments - unstructured data

Structured data:
Basically, they are those that are ordered. For example in:

An Excel table.
Spreadsheets.
Databases of any other type.
Applications to carry out test-type questionnaires.
Web forms.
Standardized customer files.
Surveys of users of a service.
You will find them organized by a series of well-defined rows and columns.

questions.question_text:
An organization's public cloud provider failed to meet their SLA of 99.99% availability.
What is the potential impact on the organization?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
C. Unexpected downtime could risk the loss of customers.

A service-level agreement (SLA) sets the expectations between the service provider and the customer and describes the products or services to be delivered, the single point of contact for end-user problems, and the metrics by which the effectiveness of the process is monitored and approved.

Selected Answer: C
C is correct

Selected Answer: C
C is correct.

Selected Answer: C
c: as IT is SLA not OLA

Selected Answer: C
C is the answer.
C. Unexpected downtime
C. Unexpected downtime could risk the loss of customers.

choices.D: All data stored in their database could be unexpectedly lost.
choices.A: The organization risks using up their error budget.
choices.B: Renegotiation of the SLA to put less emphasis on uptime could be necessary.
choices.C: Unexpected downtime could risk the loss of customers.

Selected Answer: B
A. Video Intelligence API - obviously video
B. AutoML Vision - enables you to train machine learning models to classify your images according to your own defined labels
C. BigQuery ML - this is using database
D. Looker - easy to build insight-powered workflows and applications

https://cloud.google.com/vision/automl/docs

Selected Answer: B
B is correct

Selected Answer: B
B. AutoML Vision

AutoML Vision is a Google Cloud product designed for training machine learning models on image classification tasks. It allows organizations to build custom image recognition models without extensive machine learning expertise. By providing labeled training data, users can use AutoML Vision to train a model that can categorize photographs based on specific criteria.

Selected Answer: B
AutoML Vision enables you to train machine learning models to classify your images according to your own defined labels

questions.question_text:
A multinational organization has decided to use public cloud services to modernize their IT infrastructure.
What is one benefit of doing this?

choices.B: They can expect 100% service availability in all regions.
choices.A: They can perform hardware maintenance outside of normal business hours.
choices.C: Built-in security is no longer required during data migrations.
choices.D: Access to data and computer resources is not tied to a geographical location.
